message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair price, considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,300,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the value of the product to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $1,300,000 is still a bit low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $1,350,000? I'm confident this price would be a win for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $1,300,000. How about we try $1,325,000? I'm willing to meet you halfway from our previous offers.
